subject: welcome to ICCEA2014 in Chongqing China [call for papers]
body:
ICCEA 2014

www.iccea2014.org

Welcome to the International Conference on Control Engineering and Automation, which will be held in Chongqing, China on November 29-30, 2014.

 

All accepted papers will be submitted to EI Compendex and ISTP.

 

Paper submission deadline: Friday, October 24, 2014

Acceptance notification: Wednesday, October 15, 2014

Registration deadlineFriday, October 24, 2014

Conference: November 29- 30, 2014

 

Topics:

Computing

Mechanics

Automation

Control theory and applications

Data analysis

Other related topics

 

Submission

All papers should be written in English and submitted via Email:ICCEA2014@163.com

TEL: + (86) 15377030940

More details please check on the Conference website.

 

ICCEA2014 Committee
